TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: The Dree have found a hazardous node and, at their request, we are to develop a delivery method for the toxin produced by the <color=orange>Venomous Reject</color>.
SENNETTI: This should not be difficult in and of itself, but who should deliver the toxin? We cannot ignore the possibility of the <color=purple>Bramble</color> reacting in some violent manner.
DITYLUM: I can do it. I know my way around the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color>, and I'm sure I can handle whatever happens.

AZOLLA: If you are certain, then that will be our plan. We will create a specialized mount and injector. The mount will be installed on the node to aid in administering the toxin, and you will be charged with the actual delivery.
NESIA: I am still hesitant to destroy this node. Its behavior sounds unique.
AZOLLA: We all are, but if the Dree believe it to be a significant threat, then I am inclined to be rid of it.
